mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activities (title, content, cover, tool_id, type, date, author_id, registered_count, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{cover}, #{toolId}, #{type}, #{date}, #{authorId}, #{registeredCount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE activities SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, cover = #{cover}, tool_id = #{toolId}, type = #{type}, date = #{date}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM activities a INNER JOIN activity_registrations ar ON a.id = ar.activity_id WHERE ar.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY ar.create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE activities SET registered_count = registered_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE activities SET registered_count = GREATEST(registered_count - 1, 0) WHERE id = #{id}
